Scopus Indexing 3RD INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON CHALLENGES IN INFORMATION, COMMUNICATION, AND COMPUTING TECHNOLOGY (ICCICCT-2024)

Open Access Conference Proceedings
Oct 25th & 26th, 2024

Click here to download Brochure

About the College

K.S.R. College of Engineering, Tiruchengode was established in 2001 under the leadership of Theivathiru. Dr. K. S. Rangasamy, MJF., and continues the legacy of academic excellence under the direction of Thiru. R. Srinivasan, BBM., MISTE., and remains a stronghold of educational prowess in Tamil Nadu, India. The college has earned autonomous status and affiliation with Anna University, Chennai.

Located in the tranquil surroundings of K.S.R. Kalvi Nagar, Tiruchengode. The institution enjoys nearest accessibility through the nearby Erode Junction railway station and Salem Airport, ensuring convenience for students. Accredited with an exemplary A++ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), and with several programs are accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA) and the college upholds the highest standards of academic quality and relevance.

The college offers a comprehensive range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in Engineering, Science, and Management and the college caters to diverse educational aspirations. Moreover, strategic collaborations with industry leaders such as Wipro Technologies, Microsoft, Infosys, and the ICT Academy of Tamil Nadu foster industry-academia synergy, providing students with invaluable exposure to real-world challenges and opportunities.

Through initiatives like the Microsoft Innovation Center and Campus Connect, the college nurtures innovation, entrepreneurship, and industry-relevant skills among its students, preparing them for successful careers in today’s competitive landscape. With its unwavering commitment to academic excellence, industry partnerships, and holistic student development, K.S.R. College of Engineering continues to shape the future leaders of tomorrow.

ABOUT THE DEPARTMENT

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) was established in 2001 and has since become a leading center for higher education, research, and innovation in key areas of computer science. Throughout its history, the department has consistently adapted to the rapidly changing dynamics of the engineering field, equipping students with the necessary skills to stay abreast of the latest developments. The department is committed to providing a cutting-edge learning environment, supported by a dedicated faculty and advanced laboratories that foster both theoretical and practical knowledge.

In response to the growing need for specialized expertise in emerging areas of computer science, the department introduced its M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering programme in 2007. This programme to meet the complex challenges posed by the evolving technology landscape, offering students the opportunity to gain in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in advanced topics. Recognizing the increasing importance of big data in modern industries, the department also launched the M.E. Big Data Analytics programme in 2024. Both programmes attract talented students from across the country, providing them with the skills necessary to excel in the competitive world of computer science.

The department currently has 32 research scholars who are engaged in a wide range of cutting-edge research projects. These scholars are exploring key areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, cybersecurity, quantum computing, and big data analytics. The department is deeply committed to fostering an environment that encourages innovation and intellectual curiosity. By cultivating a research-driven culture, the department ensures that its students are not only well-prepared for the workforce but also capable of contributing to the advancement of technology and innovation on a global scale.

Graduates of the department are highly sought after by both research-oriented industries and leading multinational corporations. The department’s strong industry connections and emphasis on practical learning ensure that its students are well-positioned for success in their careers. Many alumni have gone on to make significant contributions to the field of computer science, working in top-ranking multinational corporations and playing key roles in the development of new technologies.

Tiruchengode

Climate

Tiruchengode, a historic town located in the Namakkal district of Tamil Nadu, India, boasts a semi-arid climate characterized by hot summers and moderate winters. The town experiences heavy rainfall during the monsoon season, which spans from June to September, contributing to its agricultural significance.

People

Home to a diverse population, Tiruchengode reflects the rich cultural tapestry of Tamil Nadu. The town’s inhabitants, known for their warmth and hospitality, predominantly engage in agriculture, trade, and small-scale industries. Festivals like Pongal, Diwali, and Tamil New Year are celebrated with great fervor, bringing the community together in joyous festivities.

Language

Tamil is the primary language spoken in Tiruchengode, reflecting the linguistic heritage of the region. However,
due to its cultural diversity, residents may also be conversant in other languages such as English and Telugu

Transportation

Erode Junction Railway Station is approximately 16.4 kilometers away from KSR Campus. Salem Railway Station is around 53.8 kilometers southwest of Tiruchengode. Coimbatore International Airport is roughly 121 kilometers southwest of Tiruchengode, while Salem Airport is about 70.6 kilometers away. The distance between Tiruchengode and Namakkal, Salem, and Erode bus stands varies, with Namakkal being approximately 45.2 kilometers away, Salem around 55.9 kilometers, and Erode approximately 13.2 kilometers.

About the Conference

The International Conference on Challenges in Information, Communication, and Computing Technology (ICCICCT-2024) is scheduled to be held on October 25th & 26th, 2024. Organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at K.S.R. College of Engineering, Tiruchengode, Namakkal, Tamilnadu, India.

This conference aims to address the contemporary challenges and advancements in the field of information, communication, and computing technology. ICCICCT-2024 provides a platform for researchers, industry professionals, academicians, and students to showcase their innovative solutions, exchange ideas, and discuss practical experiences in various aspects of Computer Science and Engineering.

The conference seeks to foster collaboration among stakeholders and facilitate the dissemination of research findings to address real-time problems and challenges. With a focus on addressing the complexities and rapid advancements in computing technology, ICCICCT-2024 encourages the submission of novel research work from practicing engineers, technologists, scientists, research scholars, faculty members, and students.

The conference aims to explore theoretical and practical aspects of Engineering, discuss future research directions, and build networks for further research collaboration. Through paper presentations, exhibitions, and interactions with top industries showcasing innovative products, ICCICCT-2024 endeavors to promote high-quality research and facilitate knowledge exchange among participants. As a flagship event in the field, the conference catalyzes driving advancements and addressing the evolving needs of the information, communication, and computing technology landscape.
